item.title: November 9
item.description:
We're gonna try putting html in this... Focusing on page/link/navigation cleanup today!

  • Deleted links.html. It never really served much purpose rip
  • Fancied up the links in Collections and Shrines.
  • New CSS for those links in my nav that aren't actually links so they don't look like links! (Artistry and Links)
  • Added "Back" links to some pages that needed them.
  • Changed up the links in the Shrine/Collection-Specific Navbar.
  • Also a new site in Indie Sites

item.title: November 6
item.description: Ok looks like I got this working horray! To keep it short, I've added some more Bath and Body Wroks mists I forgot to include, and fixed hopefully the last stay neocities link. I feel like I always say that and then find another... Oh! Also! A couple elements on the home page have a little "pop-up" feature now when you mouse over them! I'll figre out making it keyboard/mobile accessible here soon.
